questions.question_text:
Which product should show that the project has been closed prematurely and has not achieved the objectives defined in the Project Initiation Documentation
(PID)?

discussion.content:
B

an Exception Report is used to document issues that are causing a project to veer off track1. It’s typically produced when a stage plan or project plan is forecast to exceed tolerance levels set2. However, the Exception Report is more about identifying the issue and offering options and recommendations for how to proceed2.

On the other hand, the End Project Report provides a summary of how the project performed against its original objectives, benefits, costs, and tolerances3. If a project is closed prematurely, this report should show the reasons for the closure and the extent to which the project objectives were met or not met
B is correct answer, End Project Report Composition (Lessons) states 'if project was prematurely closed, then reasons should be explained'. (p302)
Problem with B option is, when the end project report is created, the project closure hasn't been approved.

questions.question_text: Which product should show that without the calendar the company is going to experience difficulties recovering its decline in orders, and alternative solutions are required if the company is going to recover its position?

discussion.content:
B. Exception Report

An Exception Report typically highlights issues, risks, or deviations from the plan and provides information about the impact of those issues on the project or company. In this case, the decline in orders due to the absence of a calendar would be considered an exception or issue that needs to be addressed. The report would likely discuss the potential difficulties in recovering from this decline and propose alternative solutions to mitigate the situation.

Selected Answer: B
I agree with B
14.2 Objective

The objective of the starting up a project process is to ensure that:

• there is a business justification for initiating the project (documented in an outline business case)

B

The statement highlights that the Business Case is created in the Initiating a Project process and is updated throughout the project. It serves as the justification for the project and is used to determine whether the project is worth investing in. It is also mentioned that the Business Case should be reviewed and updated at key points in the project to ensure its viability.
is B the right answer as per 6.3.1

choices.B: Yes, because a business case can be developed when the scope of the project has been more fully defined
choices.D: No, because the principle of 'continued business justification' should be applied to every project
choices.A: Yes, because the executive is accountable for the business case for the duration of the project
choices.C: No, because a separate formal business case should be produced to justify every project

questions.question_text:
The executive has confirmed that ABC Company's annual business plan includes the benefits that the Health and Safety Training Project is expected to deliver.
The executive has therefore advised the project manager that this provides sufficient business justification for the project during the 'starting up a project' process.
As a result, the project manager will not need to produce an outline business case.
Is this an appropriate application of the 'business case' theme, and why?

DRAG DROP -

ORGANIZATION -
Here are three statements relating to management decisions that have been made.
Which level of management (A-E) would have made each decision?
Choose only ONE level for each responsibility. Each level can be used once, more than once, or not at all.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

discussion.content: 1. Corporate, programme management or customer (based on overall product tolerance) 2. Managing as no exception report is required so PM is managing the boundary. 3) Delivering as it contains delivery directions

questions.question_text:
The Training Development Manager is the senior supplier. Towards the end of stage 3, the Training Development Manager selected a course developer to deliver the work package for the 'finalized materials'. As a result, the project manager asked the course developer to produce a plan for this work.
Is this an appropriate application of the 'organization' theme, and why?

discussion.content: Yes, because the plan demonstrates how the product will be delivered at the 'delivering' level of management

choices.B: Yes, because the plan demonstrates how the product will be delivered at the 'delivering' level of management
choices.C: No, because the project manager should ensure that the products are delivered at the 'managing' level of management
choices.A: Yes, because the Training Development Manager is responsible for delivering at the directing' level of management
choices.D: No, because the course developer's plan should be authorized at the 'directing' level of management
